reports.title: Contract Bid Rigging
reports.comment: Evidence of bid rigging in government contract. Multiple contractors involved in price fixing scheme.

reports.title: Hospital Crisis
reports.comment: Local hospital lacks essential medical supplies. Emergency room severely understaffed.

reports.title: Forest Protection Violation
reports.comment: Illegal logging activity in protected forest. Multiple trucks observed without permits.

reports.title: School Infrastructure
reports.comment: School building requires urgent repairs. Roof leaking, walls cracking.

reports.title: Election Fraud
reports.comment: Election officials accepting bribes at polling station. Video evidence available.

reports.title: Water Crisis
reports.comment: Water supply contamination in residential area. Health hazard for 1000+ residents.

reports.title: Police Misconduct
reports.comment: Police brutality during peaceful protest. Multiple witnesses and video evidence.

reports.title: Road Safety Hazard
reports.comment: Dangerous road conditions causing accidents. Multiple potholes and poor lighting.
